name: Gmail Single Line and Colour Customizer
description:
Designed for the new look of Gmail by Google. See Additional info for more.
These simple overrides shrinks the email list to a single line to keep things as compact as possible.
Also has a few colour overrides to let you stylize the look more to what you like.
